name: A journey of the block
description:
This game is a preludium to a one of the most popular game in the planet (Tetris). In this puzzle/adventure game your task is to assemble the blocks before they get dropped from the top of the tetris game canvas. 

**Controls
walk - arrow keys
jump - space

**Gameplay 
your task is to assemble the block which ends in tetris game, you have to find the right block spawner to form a shape requested, upon ending first territory the block is verified by a very restrictive system. Than you just need to pass a few more obstacles and end the round by jumping into tetris game (don't worry you don't need to play it).

Try web version here https://tomeks.itch.io/a-journey-of-the-block-webgl (it may lag on some older computers)
